pullrequest.title: Update the style of collapsible items

content.raw:
I see you went with the object name option, which is what we've been doing so far, so I think it's ok, especially since this button shouldn't change style.

I'll just mention the other approach I've been looking into, namely [Dynamic Properties and Stylesheets](https://wiki.qt.io/Dynamic_Properties_and_Stylesheets). It offers a way for the style to be changed programatically without hardcoding it in the C++ code and placing it on the qss file instead. This would allow, for example, applying the "warning" style to other buttons on demand, while giving downstream applications the flexibility to choose their own style.

I've been meaning to use this for the plot's `VariablePill`s, started here: 57118ef
